overview:
## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperResponse] with the result of the call.

## Discussion

In your implementation, handle the specified command and return an appropriate [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperResponse]. The framework is responsible for delivering this response to the system; don’t invoke the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperResponse/deliver()] method of [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperResponse] manually.

# handleCommand(_:)

**Instance Method**

Handles a given hotspot command, in response to a request from the framework.

## Declaration

```swift
func handleCommand(_ command: NEHotspotHelperCommand) async -> NEHotspotHelperResponse
```

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperResponse] with the result of the call.

## Discussion

In your implementation, handle the specified command and return an appropriate [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperResponse]. The framework is responsible for delivering this response to the system; don’t invoke the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperResponse/deliver()] method of [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperResponse] manually.

## Sending commands to the provider

- **NEHotspotHelperCommand**: A command for the hotspot helper to handle.
